name: Show title and author on Weasyl submissions
description: This userstyle will no longer be updated! Weasyl implemented the feature on the website proper, so there is no longer a need for this style. Shows the title and username of the author on Weasyl submissions inside your submission notifications and inside the site-search and browse. Currently does not show them anywhere else. This userstyle is still a bit rough around the edges.
additional_info:
